Name: Kingdom Gun
About the game: This game is hard! Play solo or with friends to unlock up to 6 unique characters and 150+ guns, items, and pets! You are tasked with exploring an unknown continent by The Kingdom. Based on the character you select the reason for being on the continent changes! Conquest, power, knowledge, vengeance, and more!
